spec.name: Sqala Of Casablanca
spec.description:
🔻 Date: 1755
🔻 Status: Open
🔻 Description: The Sqala (Bastion) was fiirst built in the 15th century to defend the Atlantic coast. When Sultane Mohammed Ben Abdellah decided to build a new city in Anfa (Casablanca) he rebuilt the Sqala in 1755 CE to strengthen the defense of the city.

- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fortifications_of_Vauban
